message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can work from there.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Let's compromise. I'll take 70% and you get 30%. We're both getting closer to an agreement!
Let's split it down the middle. A 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money.
